name: Decry Thief
prereq: Zephyr Guard Dedication; Trained In Intimidation
summary: When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects.
description:
When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects.

Critical Success For 1 round, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed and a –4 status penalty to Stealth.
Success For 1 round, the target takes a –5-foot status penalty to Speed and a –2 status penalty to Stealth.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
